entry.title: Game: Lumines: Electronic Symphony (Vita, 2012)
entry.content:
I got this today and played for like 27 minutes and had one of the best runs I ever have had on a Lumines game.

Total time: 27:00

entry.title: Game: Hot Shots Golf: World Invitational (Vita, 2012)
entry.content:
I played this for like 20 minutes. I've never played at Hot Shots Golf game before, but I've been curious. The PS Vita bundle I bought came with it, so I figured, what the heck. I played two holes as Yuna. It was kind of fun.

Total time: 22:00

entry.title: Game: Asura's Wrath (PS3, 2012) (3)
entry.content:
I played for two hours tonight and got to 11.5. There were so many absurd moments. I loved how Asura flew by punching the ground and riding the shock wave. I loved the onsen sequence and how Asura was denied. I loved how Augus and Asura are inexplicably on the moon and how ridiculously huge Augus' sword is (and how he's never drawn it but once). I loved the gigantic crater from the sword and how Asura always ends up with no arms. It's also very intriguing that Augus was robot-y too. What could that mean?

Total time: 4:15

entry.title: Game: Asura's Wrath (PS3, 2012) (2)
entry.content:
I showed my wife the awesome Wyzen fight and then did the next two episodes. The "ending" was cool and the awesome arm-less fight. This game is just sooo ridiculous. I can tell my wife is kind of appalled at how insane it is. I love that about it.

Total time: 2:31

entry.title: Game: Asura's Wrath (PS3, 2012)
entry.content:
I bought this game on the recommendation of the Giant Bomb podcast. Tonight I played for a little less than two hours and played through the first five episodes. This game is insane. I love the over-the-top-ness. I love the TV show stylings. The combat and shooting feel interesting and like I'm doing something, although I get the impression that I can't lose and it's just a matter of smashing enough until I can Burst, although I suppose I could simply pay attention to my score at the end. So far, I think it's a really unique and amazing experience.

Total time: 1:42
